entry.string: The Recommend module allows visitors to your website a chance to send out recommendations to their friends.
entry.translation: Zee Recummend mudoole-a elloos feesiturs tu yuoor vebseete-a a chunce-a tu send oooot recummendeshuns tu zeeur freeends. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice.
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a.

entry.string: "Modify Configuration". From this menu option, you can set the template that will be used for the email that is sent out, as well as override that choice and allow users to send their own message.
entry.translation: "Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun". Frum thees menoo oopshun, yuoo cun set zee templete-a thet veell be-a used fur zee imeeel thet is sent oooot, es vell es ooferreede-a thet chueece-a und elloo users tu send zeeur oovn messege-a.

entry.string: There are no included blocks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet thees mudoole-a.

entry.string: There are no included hooks with this module.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded huuks veet thees mudoole-a.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
